articles.title: Finally! OnePlus is back in a banned European market - Android Authority
articles.description: It's taken long enough, but OnePlus is finally back in one major market after its parent company signed a patent agreement with Nokia.
articles.content:
• OnePlus has resumed operations in Germany following a legal dispute with Nokia.
  • The company is now selling the OnePlus Open in the market and is accepting OnePlus 12/12R pre-orders.
